d1_text:
Npc0330:
ï¿½It's just a hunch,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but I think the ghosts in the tunnel don't like anything upbeat and cheerful.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½When I was driving in the tunnel,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I was playing some grooving tunes and the ghosts moved slower.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I think the ghosts can't stand anything positive.[HALT][END]
